casebody.data:
LESTER H. CROWTHER, Executor, v. ADOLPH B. HIRSCHMANN [No. 9,

January Term, 1937.]

*698 Decided March 16th, 1937.

The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Urner, Offutt, Parke, Sloan, Mitchell, Shehan, and Johnson, JJ.

Lester H. Crowther and Charles F. Obrecht, for the appellant. Jacob Kartmcm, with whom were Makover & Kartman on the brief, for the appellee. Bond, C. J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court.
